column2: Who are the teammates in this activity? Write their names. (One submission per team is enough)
column3: Activity: We are trying to find solution to Customer Issues. The main responsibility of a customer support agent is solving the issues customers are facing. Some company wants to use a flowchart to communicate the steps the user needs to take to arrive at a solution. In case, the customer support agent is having trouble understanding the issue faced by the customer, he can use a flowchart to analyze the issue and arrive at a solution. The below diagram shows the steps the agent needs to take to arrive at a solution. But the flow he needs to follow is missing. Your task here is to complete the diagram with the appropriate flow so that the customer issue is solved. You can use a blank piece of paper to complete the flow chart, and upload it here.
